definition: bean vermicelli/mung bean starch noodles/Chinese vermicelli/cellophane noodles/CL:把[ba3]/fan (loanword)/enthusiast for sb or sth
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink
silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: When the band only played for 15 minutes, the fans felt they had been shortchanged.
sentences.chinese: 樂隊只演奏了15分鐘，粉絲們覺得自己受騙了。

sentences.english: And those same people post to the positive articles, too, and call everyone fanboys.
sentences.chinese: 那些發佈積極文章的人們，叫每個人粉絲。

sentences.english: The basketball fans call him flying man in China.
sentences.chinese: 他的籃球粉絲們都叫他“中國飛人”。

sentences.english: You use words like "brainwashed" and"lemmings" to describe Apple fans.
sentences.chinese: 你用“腦殘”和“傻X”去形容蘋果粉絲。

sentences.english: Everywhere he goes, he causes chaos , making his fans split their sides with laughter.
sentences.chinese: 無論他走到哪裏都製造混亂，使他的粉絲們笑破肚皮。

sentences.english: Now, that is what we call a rabid fangirl.
sentences.chinese: 這就是所謂的狂熱粉絲。

sentences.english: I'm a fan of JJ Lam.
Single-handedly wins the Potter vs Twilight ‘who has the maddest fans' debate.
sentences.chinese: 在暮光和哈利波特“誰是最瘋狂粉絲”的比賽中勝出。

sentences.english: So I really feel that I owe them a lot.
sentences.chinese: 所以我真的覺得虧欠粉絲們很多。

sentences.english: Thank you DYT's China fans for providing the photos.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝戴陽天中國粉絲提供照片。

sentences.english: He was loved by millions of fans around the world, and had a mass of fortune.
sentences.chinese: 他在全球有百萬計的忠實粉絲，同時又財富五車。

sentences.english: But the news for romance novel fans isn't entirely heart-breaking.
sentences.chinese: 然而這樣的新聞並不能完全喚醒言情小說的粉絲。

sentences.english: Jinan where fans have to sell duck blood soup?
sentences.chinese: 濟南哪兒有賣鴨血粉絲湯的？

sentences.english: The strong bond between Rachel and her fans can be felt from the interaction with her fans at the .
sentences.chinese: 和粉絲的交情從《粉絲同樂會》的互動中便能察覺。

sentences.english: The strong bond between Rachel and her fans can be felt from the interaction with her fans at the .
sentences.chinese: 和粉絲的交情從《粉絲同樂會》的互動中便能察覺。

sentences.english: He ignored shouts begging him to stop and sign autographs.
sentences.chinese: 他絲毫不理會粉絲求他停下來簽名的喊叫聲。

definition: the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
to be present/to be on the scene
